dmca.title: [ABUSE] Lacoste Alligator, S.A. - U.S. - Patchboys.com by Stephen Spenard selling inf
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Friday, February 18, 2005 2:28 PM
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] Lacoste Alligator, S.A. - U.S. - Patchboys.com by
Stephen Spenard selling infringing Lacoste products (Our Ref.: LCA USA
TC-05/00969)

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1




Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/


This is a forwarded message
From: Lisa Pearson < >
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>
Date: Friday, February 18, 2005, 10:37:39 AM
Subject: [ABUSE] Lacoste Alligator, S.A. - U.S. -  Patchboys.com by Stephen
Spenard selling infringing Lacoste products (Our Ref.: LCA USA TC-05/00969)

===8<==============Original message text===============
Please see the attached letter.  Thank you.

Lisa Pearson
Fross Zelnick Lehrman & Zissu, P.C.
866 United Nations Plaza
First Avenue & 48th Street
New York, New York  10017
Telephone:  (212) 813-5900
Facsimile:  (212) 813-5901


****************************************************************************
****************************************
The information contained in this E-mail message may be privileged,
confidential, and protected
from disclosure.  Any unauthorized use, printing, copying, disclosure or
dissemination of this
communication may be subject to legal restriction or sanction.  If you think
that you have received
this E-mail message in error, please reply to the sender.
****************************************************************************
******************************************

===8<===========End of original message text===========
